text: Pholidobolus anomalus, the strange pholiodobolus, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Peru. ==References== Category:Pholidobolus Category:Reptiles of Peru Category:Endemic fauna of Peru Category:Reptiles described in 1923 Category:Taxa named by Lorenz Müller
title: Pholidobolus anomalus
